channel.title: Godsword Special Attack Problem
channel.description:
Hey,
I Have Problem With My Godswords Special attack My Prob Its Not Clear But Ill Try To Explain : Ill Take The Sgs As Example:
When I Spec Animtion 100% work but the style spec attack its like obby maul attack with sgs animtion
I Made This Video So Please Watch This Help You To Understand Me:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=73qOmCsM6Y0
Thanks I Hope Someone Can Help me ;)

item.title: Godsword Special Attack Problem
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

[quote=“Layman0, post:1, topic:341655”]Hey,

I Have Problem With My Godswords Special attack My Prob Its Not Clear But Ill Try To Explain :
Ill Take The Sgs As Example:

When I Spec Animtion 100% work but the style spec attack its like obby maul attack with sgs animtion

I Made This Video So Please Watch This Help You To Understand Me:

Thanks I Hope Someone Can Help me
;)[/quote]

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(2890);// this is whats wrong you need to change animation. specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = 25 + misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(15) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }
Your animation id is wrong, maybe due to gs stances or something.

Read full topic
